entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type ''. The exception 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' when Dbcontext has HasDiscriminator() #31404
  • ExecuteUpdate generates invalid SQL for SQLite with TPT #31402
  • Query: Distinct on entity containing primitive array gives wrong results when projecting multiple collections due to result bucketing issues #31398
  • Query/Json: projecting individual properties of JSON collection with Distinct fails due to insufficient information #31397

Closed

  • Query: add support for projecting primitive collections from JSON entities #31364
    8.0.0
  • Support for Cosmos Db Hierarchical Partition Keys #31403
  • Include if a migration has destructive operations in `ef migrations list --json` #31319
  • Update entity using isModified = false do update the DB sometime #31295
  • How to populate collection of a many to many relation without needed to use Include()? #31283
  • EFCORE 7 not supported in Azure Function V4 .net6 isolated? #30897

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31400
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Only discover complex types when configured through pre-convention model configuration or annotation #31399

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.1.1 #31286
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29572 - Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #31264
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.x] Perform alias uniquification in ExecuteUpdate setters #31208
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.11 #31394
  • Update branding to 6.0.22 #31393

Updated

  • Use IN instead of EXISTS in more places #31387
  • SQLite: Translate more Math members #31356
    blocked
  • Migrations: Use comparer to diff default values #31396
  • Generate type mappings in the compiled model. #31390
  • Metadata for primitive collection mapping #31351
  • Fix to #31365 - Query: add support for projecting JSON entities that have been composed on #31391
